channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America’s child care crunch is keeping parents from running for public office because they simply ‘cannot make it all work,’ state senator says
item.description: Stephanie Chang said she used to race across the state with her baby so she could make 9 a.m. committee meetings at the state Capitol.

item.title: Stock markets tank on bad GDP news as Trump puts blame on ‘Biden’s stock market’
item.description: Dow falls more than 750 at one point.

item.title: Spain Searches for Answers on What Caused Power Blackout
item.description: The countries’ top officials were trying to determine the cause of an outage that left tens of millions of people across the Iberian Peninsula without...

item.title: Microsoft says it will ‘vigorously’ contest any government orders to halt cloud operations in Europe: ‘If we ever find ourselves losing we will put in place business continuity arrangements’
item.description: European leaders are alarmed about Trump's policy changes that throw into doubt his administration's commitment to the trans-Atlantic relationship.

item.title: How much deterioration in the world’s largest economy could be traced to Trump’s policies? ‘All of it,’ one economist says
item.description: GDP and hiring have both sunk as a result of Trump upending decades of American trade policy.

item.title: Private hiring slowed in April out of fear of tariff impacts. ‘Unease is the word of the day,’ ADP chief economist says
item.description: These job gains were even lower than economists had expected.

item.title: Macron Surprises a Provincial Bar
item.description: The French president, often seen as remote, wants to get closer to the French people.
